price: Ve (onlara) süsler de (verirdik). Bunların hepsi geçici hayatın metasıdır. Ahiret ise Rabbin katında korunanlara aittir.
arabic: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhālika lammā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-ākhiratu ʿinda rabbika lil'muttaqīna
